targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("type" = 'percent' AND "type_instance" = 'user' AND "instance" = '0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("type" = 'percent' AND "type_instance" = 'user' AND "instance" = '0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT 100 - mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'idle') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
